title: Optimizing Learner Experience in Online and Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and core job-related knowledge
context.additional_context: A project-based learning environment for strengthening social sector job competencies among working professionals.

learning_goals: Identifying and applying at least three self-directed learning strategies in online/blended learning environments
Completing at least two mini-projects that solve real workplace problems using a learning-by-doing approach
Independently resolving over 80% of technical issues encountered while interacting with peers and instructors on digital platforms

resources: Access Permissions for LMS (Learning Management System) Platforms

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
